com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera.Camera
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleCamera

    public abstract class Camera
extends Object
    This class handles calculating all properties necessary to configure the camera position while routing. The MapboxNavigation uses a SimpleCamera by default. If you would like to customize the camera position, create a concrete implementation of this class or subclass SimpleCamera and update MapboxNavigation.setCameraEngine(Camera).
    Since:
    0.10.0

      The angle, in degrees, of the camera angle from the nadir (directly facing the Earth).
      abstract double zoom(RouteInformation routeInformation)
      Zoom level near the center of the screen.

      • bearing

        public abstract double bearing(RouteInformation routeInformation)
        Direction that the camera is pointing in, in degrees clockwise from north.

      • target

        public abstract com.mapbox.geojson.Point target(RouteInformation routeInformation)
        The location that the camera is pointing at.

      • tilt

        public abstract double tilt(RouteInformation routeInformation)
        The angle, in degrees, of the camera angle from the nadir (directly facing the Earth). See tilt(float) for details of restrictions on the range of values.

      • zoom

        public abstract double zoom(RouteInformation routeInformation)
        Zoom level near the center of the screen. See zoom(float) for the definition of the camera's zoom level.
